CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do you run any ‘off-cycle’ payrolls? Off-cycle Payrolls are defined as "bonus, commission, or variable pay that is not included with the employees regular payroll. In addition, off-cycle payroll is also if you pay or correct employee's payroll and they will receive a payroll that is separate from their regularly scheduled check.
CustomField.label: Off-Cycle payroll
